OOC: I said he was blocking the flame from his face using his right 
arm but was still getting senged elsewhere

The Post:
>   > Waspinator got singed from the flame and used his
>   > right arm to black 
>   > it from his face but was taking damage fast, he
>   > fired his gun at 
>   > Grimlock with the other hand.

Waspinator could fight in beast wars you know.

IC:

Waspinator fell from the sky after being blasted by Nightlight, now 
damaged badly he converted to beast mode and flew towards the 
predacon base.

Quickstrike fell over after being blasted by Kup "That there army boy 
had more fire power then I thought" he said and jumped up although he 
was damaged now "Hey boss we sure could use a plan right about now" 
he said to Megatron.
